metadata.title: CVE-2023-28617 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
org-babel-execute:latex in ob-latex.el in Org Mode through 9.6.1 for GNUEmacs allows attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a file name ordirectory name that contains shell metacharacters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28617` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

emacs24 - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3
emacs24-bin-common - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3
emacs24-common - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3
emacs24-el - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3
emacs24-lucid - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3
emacs24-nox - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xemacs21 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
emacs24 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3').
org-mode package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
